title: Richard Ramirez
summary: Ricardo "Richard" Leyva Muñoz Ramírez (/rəˈmɪərɛz/; February 29, 1960 – June 7, 2013), dubbed the Valley Intruder (as his attacks were first clustered in the San Gabriel Valley), the Walk-in Killer, and most infamously, the Night Stalker,[1] was an American serial killer, serial rapist, kidnapper, child molester, and burglar, convicted in 1989.
